text: 10 2 Pi 2.12 Maykel nɨgtep gɨl anɨb agak. Bɨ agobun anɨb okok pen, tap tɨtay dɨl mɨdeb agɨl ma nepal okok monmon agjupal. Anɨb ak tek ak, gos tɨmud kɨli ak ke pal ak pal ak mɨdɨl, chen ladek chag ladek okok gos kɨli mɨdebal tek mɨdebal. Pen tap tɨmel yɨbɨl adek ak gebal ak, kɨlop ke gɨ tɨmel yɨbɨl geb.
